text.content:
New Classes

Monster Hunters

This class encompasses multiple Career Paths (work-in-progress) that work together under a "Monster Hunter Guild" which specializes in taking jobs related to hunting down various Monstrosities, both small like Goblins and huge like Basilisks.

Some jobs are taken from Alchemists needing special ingredients, other times it's a Monster that threatens a peaceful countryside village.

Class Trappings: Cloak, Clothing, Hand Weapon, Pouch, Backpack containing Book (Beasts and Monsters)
